posts.text: Donald Trump has announced plans to make the U.S. capital "safer and more beautiful," promising immediate action to relocate the homeless and crack down on crime. The former president will hold a news conference at the White House to outline his strategy. #Trump #WashingtonDC #Homelessness #Crime…

posts.text: While he thinks of #Harris as a friend, #Sanders criticized her for mostly listening to "very #wealthy people" during her unsuccessful campaign against #PresidentDonaldTrump. posts.text:
Für mich jetzt schon das Unwort des Jahres 2025: DEAL.

Vor allem, weil dabei übersehen wird, dass es mitunter die Lebensrealität von Menschen verschlechtert und sogar Menschenleben kostet (Ukraine, Entwicklungshilfe). Das Wort ist in diesem Kontext abgrundtief widerlich. #Trump

posts.text: #Trump is quite possibly the biggest self-crying victim in the history of the US. No matter what he does or says, he never owns it and if he is wrong, he will never admit it! When it comes to apologizing, that will never happen. Only real men can admit when they are wrong, he is not a real man!
